ygData.subject: Re: Kill Stealing
ygData.msgSnippet: That sounds like classic I take no responsibility for my actions sort of defence for basically immature behavior.  Oh poor you, you can t find a group,
ygData.messageBody:
That sounds like classic "I take no responsibility for my actions" sort of
defence for basically immature behavior. Oh poor you, you can't find a
group, therefore I'll just steal. Sounds kind of familiar to stuff like,
Poor me, I had no parental guidance as a child, so I mug people. You have
some very faulty reasoning going on. If you want to get groups, you don't
kill steal--EVER. You do it once, and you're already risking getting a bad
name for yourself. Do it more than that and you can guarantee you'll never
get groups again. Not only that, but kill stealing has a very short life
span. You can kill steal up to a certain level, and then parties begin to
decend into dungeons where you can't crawl by yourself to steal. Also,
total party damage at these higher levels will begin to outstrip yours if
they have a balanced group. Your leveling will begin to peter out, and
you'll be left roaming around looking for something worth exp that a group
is killing so that you can get your smidgeon of exp by stealing it.

Another thing too, have you not considered that all the other classes have
the same grouping problems you do? I also play a cleric, and there have
been many a time I was planted on my duff waiting for a group. None of
these other classes are able to effectively kill steal, so what about them?
To hell with them, is probably what you'd say.

That's why you don't get groups. You don't know how to interact with other
people. You'll be a fringe parasite for a long time unless you shape up.
"I can't get groups, so that's why I kill steal," is a two year old's
defence after pushing his brother down in the sand and taking his candy
because he didn't do anything to deserve one from momma too.

Waah.


> -----Original Message-----
> From: yur@... [mailto:yur@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, June 09, 1999 10:34 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Kill Stealing
>
>
> From: yur@...
>
>
>
> You guys don't seem to understand why some of us (such as
> myself) kill
> steal all the time. IT IS BECAUSE WE CANNOT FIND GROUPS !!!
> simple as that.
> no groups, KS ! thats it. I don't feel like sitting on my ass
> for 30 - 40 min
> waiting for ppl to group, while shouting all the time.
>
> 1) people hate us for shouting so much
> 2) people don't message us even if they need group member (weird)
>
> You ppl who are against kill stealers by shouting their
> names out so no one
> will group them are so god damn stupid, all you have to do is
> group with them
> and BINGO !! no more kill stealing. If i am getting good xp ,
> why kill steal
> ?? there is no point for me to risk my life trying to get xp
> from some monster
> 6 others are beating up on. I rarely die in a group since I
> stand so far back,
> but while kill stealing if i beat them up too much, the mob might
> run to me with
> no one else helping. If you really want to stop kill stealing,
> then just group
> with those people so you guys can take on higher mobs together. I would
> happily stop KS anytime during the day to Group with ppl passing
> by. I only KS
> while waiting for groups and i do shout for groups while i KS as well.
> People are stupid and don't know how to stop a problem, oh
> well... what can you
> do ?
>
>
>
